opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Decree affirmed. Each party to bear own costs.
Mr. Chief Justice Bell took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Joseph R. Rygiel, with him Ralph K. Barclay, Jr., Ira B. Goldren, Jr., and Goldren & Adams, for appellants.
casebody.head_matter:
Brown Estate.
Argued January 14, 1971.
Before Jones, Eagen, O’Brien, Boberts, Pomeroy and Barbieri, JJ.
reargument refused November 9, 1971.
Joseph R. Rygiel, with him Ralph K. Barclay, Jr., Ira B. Goldren, Jr., and Goldren & Adams, for appellants.
Daniel G. Reilly, for appellee.
October 12, 1971:
